CustomField.description: Defines an Payee Timesheet Allowance Template Group that will apply for the Assignment. When selected, the Payee Timeheet Allowances defined within the selected Template Group will be cloned and related to the Assignment.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Defines an Payee Timesheet Allowance Template Group that will apply for the Assignment. When selected, the Payee Timeheet Allowances defined within the selected Template Group will be cloned and related to the Assignment.
CustomField.label: Payee Timesheet Allowance Template Group
